intro.p: This page will help familiarize you with the Hibernate Tools for Eclipse plugin. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.

item.p: To be able to use Hibernate Tools optimally you need to create a "Hibernate Console Configuration". Such a configuration tells Hibernate Tools which hibernate configuration (cfg.xml), mapping files and classpath it should use to build up a Hibernate Configuration.
To learn more about Hibernate Tools you can read the Hibernate Tools Help or visit Hibernate Tools Website
